title: Middle School Mathematics Concept Mastery Program Using Adaptive Scaffolding

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Operations and Fundamental Algebraic Knowledge
context.additional_context: Customized learning pathways based on conceptual hierarchy and misconception diagnosis, delivered through an LMS optimized for smartphone environments.

learning_goals: Learners can perform three-tier scaffolding activities, which dynamically adjust based on conceptual understanding, with over 80% accuracy.
Over 90% of learners pass concept connection explanation assessments by visualizing relational networks between mathematical concepts.
Through misconception diagnostic quizzes, learners can improve individual error patterns by over 70%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
